item.title: Test: Notebook With Plot and Table
item.description: import matplotlib.pyplot as plt import numpy as np x = np.array(range(0,10)) y = x ** 2 plt.plot(x,y) plt.show() import pandas as pd df = pd.read_csv('vacc_train_data.tsv',sep='\t', names=['target','comment']) df.head(5) .dataframe tbody tr th { vertical-align: top; } .dataframe thead th { text-align: right; }
